A message that "so long and you make numbers go brrr and you buy our stuff, we'll let you be free range bigots no question 💋"

we see this in gaming very, very constantly. Companies that are afraid to block and ban accounts because "we don't want to send the wrong message"-so they share a BW's cosplay and the comments are a fucking cesspool of racists, fatphobes, and shitty racist memes while the company goes

I said this on my moderation panel at Yale, and I will say it here for the BlueSky team to see:

Part of moderation and safety is deciding who does and doesn't get to stay.  There will be people who are not included, full stop.

Your policies determine who sticks around.

and that's what it boils down to: laziness.
